p: The results obtained were analyzed by using Statgraphics Plus version 4.1 (Statgraphics Technologies Inc., The Plains, Virginia) with a one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA). Tukey’s test at a significance level of α = 0.05 was applied. All the chemical analyses were conducted in triplicates, and the data were expressed as mean ± standard deviation (SD). Differences between individual means were deemed to be significant at p < 0.05.
